title: PBE deactivated....
body: My PBE account got deactivated. And i want it reactivate, please? I know i wasnt much on it before but now its different, please riot? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Ty @Porocles ! i just did it, now i hope ill get it reactivated -finger cross-{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I do see a PBE attached to this account.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our team will help get you back in.  Hang tight for now!
